scripts.postinstall: lerna exec -- yarn install && lerna run prepare
scripts.ci:generate: cd packages/server && yarn ci:generate && cd ../app && yarn ci:generate
scripts.start: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --names 'REACT, react-autogen, GRAPHQL, graphql-autogen' -c 'blue.bold,gray,cyan.bold,gray' 'cd packages/app && yarn dev' 'cd packages/app && yarn generate:graphqlcodegen -w' 'cd packages/server && yarn dev' 'cd packages/server && yarn generate:graphqlcodegen -w'
scripts.start:prod: yarn build && ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --names 'REACT, GRAPHQL' -c 'blue.bold,cyan.bold' 'cd packages/app && yarn start' 'cd packages/server && yarn start'
